## Problem 1
### Read and clean Mr. Trash Wheel data sheet

```{r}

# First, load necessary packages.

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

# Import excel file and name it 'p1_trash', specify sheet, and clean up variable names

p1_trash=read_excel(path="./data/healthyharbor.xlsx", sheet=1) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() 
  

```
